item.title: Footpath is no longer accessible, 11th April
item.description:
The Kissing gate prevents trampers/wheel chair users and buggy users from accessing this footpath which cuts of a dangerous part of the road way

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Ham Lane, Cheltenham

item.title: The drain is blocked problem, 11th April
item.description:
Customer reports that it appears someone has poured wet concrete down the gully at location. Has dried onto the grate and also small drips going all the way down the road. Area has flooded in the past and they are concerned this will cause big issues for the drainage system on the road.
Report on FixMyStreet
